title: Willie Comics
additional-notes: A note in the 1974 CCE Periodicals volume says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information.  The first cataloged issue renewal, mentioned in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, is for the Fall 1946 issue, and was filed in 1974.

Issues 20 and 21 were published and renewed under the title 'Li'l Willie Comics'.  A note in the 1977 January-June CCE Periodicals volume says to consult the copyright office for renewal details, and the issue renewals are recorded in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume.
